verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Nearer, still nearer
Close to Thy heart,
Draw me, my Savior
So precious Thou art!
Fold me oh fold me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
To Thy breast,
Shelter me safe
In that "Haven of Rest";
Shelter me safe
In that "Haven of Rest."

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Nearer, still nearer
Nothing I bring,
Naught as an offering
To Jesus, my King;
Only my sinful,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Now contrite heart.
Grant me the cleansing
Thy blood doth impart,
Grant me the cleansing
Thy blood doth impart.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Nearer, still nearer
While life shall last,
Till safe in glory
My anchor is cast;
Through endless ages ever to be,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Nearer, my Savior
Still nearer to Thee,
Nearer my Savior
Still nearer to Thee.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Nearer, still nearer
Lord to be Thine!
Sin with its follies
I gladly resign,
All of its pleasures,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Pomp and its pride.
Give me but Jesus
My Lord crucified;
Give me but Jesus
My Lord crucified.
